item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/events/431599113589708/

 

Beat cabin fever and come out for a night of Salsa dancing for a great cause!

Salsa dancing lesson starts at 8:30pm then practice your new moves all night! No stranger to Salsa? Come join and show us how it's done!

$10 Cover charge at the door to benefit Boston Rotaract's International Service Project in Guatemala. What to know more? Keep reading:

In the mountains high above Guatemala's Lake Atitlan, many families do not have access to safe, clean drinking water. This region has one of the highest incidence rates of childhood diarrhea, due mainly to its contaminated water source, but also complicated by sanitation issues and bad hygiene.

Boston Rotaract will be hosting its third annual Noche de Salsa Benefit at Ryles Jazz Club. Last year’s hugely successful event benefited our water, sanitation, and hygiene project, which purchased water filters, soap, sandals, and dental hygiene items for two indigenous communities in the mountains of Guatemala. 

Please join us for a fun night of salsa lessons, dancing, and raffle prizes!

To sponsor a filter, donate, or learn more contact Shelby.

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Boston Rotaract Salsa Fundraiser
